body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Wayne Gray and the customer's name is Jessica Lewis.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Wayne Gray, and I’m with Greenfield Accounting Firm. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Wayne, I’m Jessica Lewis. I have some questions about my latest billing statement.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Jessica. I’d be happy to help you with that. Can I ask how you’re feeling about the billing statement?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Honestly, I'm a bit confused and frustrated with some of the charges.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be frustrating. Let's get to the bottom of it. First, could you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And can I also get the last four digits of your social security number for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Jessica. Let me pull up your account and review the charges for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Wayne. I appreciate your help in this matter.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: My pleasure, Jessica! I really appreciate your patience. If you have any further questions after I review this, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Jessica. Have a great day!
